description: [Status: stable] [Name: trailing-whitespace] [Message: Trailing whitespace] What it does Checks for superfluous trailing whitespace. Why is this bad? According to PEP 8, "avoid trailing whitespace anywhere. Because itâ€™s usually invisible, it can be confusing" Example spam(1) \n# Use instead: spam(1)\n# Fix safety This fix is marked unsafe if the whitespace is inside a multiline string, as removing it changes the string's content.
